player module¶

class player.Player(sheet, start_pos, speed=4, power=30)¶

Bases: animated_sprite.Animated_Sprite

Player class that the user will control.

Parameters:
  • sheet – The image used for the sprite sheet of player.
  • start_pos – Starting position for the Player.
  • name – String of the player name.
  • speed – Speed at which the player can move. Both horizontal and vertical.
adjust_height(ground, xoffset)¶

Adjusts the height of the player to climb slopes.

Parameters:xoffset – How many pixels the player wants to move left or right.
apply_damage(damage)¶

Has a player take damage.

Parameters:damage – How much damage to take.
calc_angle(pos)¶

Helper function to calculate angle of trajectory for projectile.

Parameters:pos – Position of mouse.
change_anim(anim_name)¶

Changes the current animation to something different, for example, from idle to moving left or moving right to idle.

Parameters:anim_name – The name of the animation to be set.
check_movement(ground, keys)¶

Perform actions based on what keys are pressed.

Parameters:
  • keys – The keys that are currently being pressed.
  • ground – The surface the player is walking on.
collide_ground(ground, offset)¶

Returns the point of collision between player and ground with the given offset.

Parameters:
  • ground – Reference to ground.
  • offset – Tuple that offsets the player’s mask.
draw_health()¶

Draws the health bar.

draw_power()¶

Draws the power bar.

fire(mouse_pos, collidables)¶

Fires A Projectile

Parameters:
  • mouse_pos – The mouse position used to calculate the angle to fire the projectile.
  • collidables – A list of objects a projectile can collide with.
transition(new_anim, ground, dx)¶

Helper function for updating animation and movement in check_movement.

Parameters:
  • new_anim – New animation to set.
  • ground – The surface the player is walking on.
  • dx – Amount that the player will move on the next frame.
update(world)¶

Update the Player

Parameters:world – The world the player inhabits.
